CustomField.description:
Field that stores the Status of a Member before it is set to 'Complete' - i.e. the category of the Member if applicable.
This is useful for the Categorisation (Waves) functionality, as this will preserve the 'Category' (Status value) of the Member before it is set to 'Completed'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Preserves the Campaign Status value, useful for reporting. Essentially mirrors it until the Campaign Status value is 'Completed'.
CustomField.label: Category Status
